content:
FHIR-32354 Persuasive Consider making Provenance.reason a CodeableReference
FHIR-32519 Persuasive with Modification Remove explicit reference to codes and provide an example binding and the choises of codes systems in which concepts can be found.
FHIR-32446 Persuasive Definition of minor vs. serious are problematic
FHIR-32445 Persuasive with Modification Why are the AuditEvent.outcome codes weird numbers
FHIR-26884 Persuasive Provenance recorded may be unknown
